title: Account is stuck in game
body: I played a game this morning, and during the game i dced and wasn't able to reconnect back into the game. Its been about 2 hours  now and I still can't reconnect back into the game. I thought by now the game would be over and i would able to proceed with another game, but there is only a reconnect option. I've tried restarting my computer, relaunching the client, resetting my router and still nothing. Is anyone else having the same problem?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like you're experiencing what is known as a Ghost Game, these are caused when the client/server doesn't receive the proper "End Game" message.

These aren't something you can fix yourself, nor can Riot. You just have to wait it out, the issue will resolve itself within a couple hours.
